page.title: 14Recreation.
page.content: Among the adult male population in the area fishing,both sea and fresh water and gardening are the popular leisure time activities.Many of their wives are involved with Women's Institutes and enjoy knitting and cooking.During the last few years however more women are joining keep-fit groups,dart teams,swimming classes etc.A large number of the younger adult population join Youth and Young Farmer's clubs. Few people go to the theatre or cinema because of the distance they would have to travel.Home videos are becoming very popular. Due to the number of forests and country lanes in the area motor rallies are popular. During Summer and early Autumn Flower,Horticultural and Agricultural Shows are popular with people of all ages.
